duties_responsibilities.duty: Interact and interview customers to determine financial needs and recommend the most appropriate products.
Cross-sell products and services to customer base.
Obtain and assemble all required account documentation and book new accounts.
Provide a high level of customer service in person, by phone and email, and assist with resolving issues, banking and financial education, and transactional research.
Continually verify and maintain customer CIP information to ensure continuous accuracy.
Recognize and report customer and working environment issues observed.
Conduct interaction with customers and staff in a courteous and professional manner providing prompt, efficient, and accurate service.
Monitor, troubleshoot, and maintain a thorough understanding of Online eBanking, Mobile App, Debit Card, and ATM products, and provide training and education to customers on these products.
Receive and process account and monetary transactions and maintain a cash drawer at a teller station, adhering to all line processes and procedures.
Authenticate override transactions for other teller staff.
Maintain a high level of facility security by monitoring through observation of alarms, cameras, and other security protocols.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience in bank/branch operations or related field.
